Maya Jama has been announced as the new host of ITV2's dating show Love Island.

articles.author: George Simpson
articles.title: Angela Lansbury on playing Elvis Presley's mother 60 years ago 'King was caring and sweet' - Express
articles.description: Angela Lansbury died yesterday at 96, but did you know that way back in 1961 she co-starred opposite Elvis Presley as his mother? In an unearthed interview, she shared touching memories of filming Blue Hawaii with The King, who died 45 years ago.

articles.title: Jamie Lee Curtis is one proud mom as she brings daughter Ruby to Halloween Ends premiere - Daily Mail
articles.description: In July 2021, Curtis revealed to the world that her youngest daughter is male-to-female transgender and had changed her name from Thomas to Ruby
articles.content:
Jamie Lee Curtis beamed with pride as she hit the red carpet with her adopted daughters Ruby, 26, and Annie, 35, at the premiere of Halloween Ends in Los Angeles on Tuesday night.
